description: This file defines the class UpgradeDeviceFirmwareLegacyRequest, which represents a device request to upgrade firmware on a legacy device within a mock Zigbee environment. It includes properties such as EUI-64 identifiers, filenames, and an authentication response, along with methods to retrieve these properties and execute the request by invoking an upgrade on a device.

classes.name: UpgradeDeviceFirmwareLegacyRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to upgrade the firmware of a legacy Zigbee device, encapsulating request parameters and execution logic.

methods.name: UpgradeDeviceFirmwareLegacyRequest
methods.description: Constructor to initialize the upgrade request with device identifiers, filenames, and authentication response.

methods.name: getEui64
methods.description: Returns the EUI-64 identifier of the device.

methods.name: getRouterEui64
methods.description: Returns the router EUI-64 associated with the upgrade request.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Executes the firmware upgrade request on the specified device, invoking the upgrade method if the device is of the expected type.
